entry.note: translate=false set due no translatable content

message.entry: Invalid argument list.
Invalid argument at position {0}.
Invalid object.
Invalid argument name ''{0}''.
Ambiguous argument name ''{0}''.
Invalid value for ''{0}'' argument.
Function argument definition error in {0}.
Invalid default value for argument ''{0}''.
Invalid output ''{0}''.

entry.note: 0 is a list of strings seprated by new lines

message.entry: Name must be one of these:\n{0}
Name must be ''{0}'' or ''{1}''.
Function requires {0} input(s).

entry.note: 0 is preamble, e.g. Invalid name-value argument Color.

message.entry: {0} Ambiguous name ''{1}''. {2}
{0} Function validation does not support class ''{1}''. For more information, see Supported classes in validation.

entry.note: 0 is preamble, e.g. Function argument definition error in foo

message.entry: {0} ''{1}'' is not recognized as a class. Make sure it is a valid class on the path.

entry.note: 0 is preamble, e.g. Invalid argument list; 1 is a number

message.entry: {0} Repeating arguments, if specified, must be in groups of {1}.
Check for wrong number of positional arguments or placement of positional arguments after name-value arguments. Also, make sure name-value arguments include both the name and the value.
Function requires exactly {0} positional input(s) before name ''{1}''.
Function requires exactly {0} positional input(s).
Function requires exactly {0} positional input(s) before name ''{1}''.
Function requires {0} to {1} positional input(s) before name ''{2}''.
Function requires {0} to {1} positional input(s).
Make sure name-value arguments include both the name and the value.
A name is expected.
Function ''{0}'' does not accept input arguments because class ''{1}'' referenced in the arguments block does not have public settable properties.
Function requires {0} more input(s).

entry.note: 0 is source of error, e.g. File: fun.m Line:4 Column:5. 1 is preamble, e.g. Function argument definition error in fun.

message.entry: {0}{1} Using ''{2}'' as both a name-value argument structure and as a positional argument is not supported.
{0}{1} Input argument ''{2}'' is declared more than once.
{0}{1} Argument ''{2}'' is referenced before it is declared in the arguments block.
{0}{1} Use of name-value argument other than the argument ''{2}'' being validated is not supported.
{0}{1} Use of name-value arguments in default values is not supported.
{0}{1} Name-value arguments are not supported in a Repeating arguments block.
{0}{1} Functions with required and optional arguments must define required arguments first.
{0}{1} Functions with required and repeating arguments must define required arguments first.
{0}{1} Functions with optional and repeating arguments must define optional arguments first.
{0}{1} Default values are not supported in a Repeating arguments block.
{0}{1} Functions with positional and name-value arguments must define positional arguments first.
{0}{1} Input arguments blocks and function line must contain the same input arguments in the same order, including ignored arguments.
{0}{1} Repeating arguments block containing varargin must not have other arguments. If specifying multiple repeating arguments, do not use varargin as an argument name.
{0}{1} When specifying name-value arguments using a class name, specifying validation for the arguments is not supported.
{0}{1} When specifying name-value arguments using a class name, specifying default values for the arguments is not supported.
{0}{1} Multiple Repeating arguments blocks are not supported.
{0}{1} Specifying multiple name-value structures using .? syntax and a class name is not supported.
{0}{1} varargin can only be used inside Repeating arguments block.
{0}{1} Use of variable ''{2}'' from function body is not supported in arguments block.
{0}{1} Use of input argument ''{2}'' is not supported in output arguments block.
{0}{1} Use of output argument ''{2}'' is not supported in input arguments block.
{0}{1} Ignored input arguments are not allowed after a Repeating arguments block or after name-value arguments.
{0}{1} Name-value argument ''{2}'' is declared more than once.
{0}{1} Use of name ''{2}'' as both a class and variable or function is not supported.
{0}{1} Unknown function argument attribute ''{2}''.
{0}{1} Assigning the function argument attribute ''{2}'' multiple times is not supported.
{0}{1} Attribute values in arguments blocks must be logical constants.
{0}{1} Use of nested functions is not supported in arguments blocks.
{0}{1} Arguments blocks in nested function declarations are not supported.
"Restrictions on Variable and Function Access" in the MATLAB documentation
{0}{1} Use of function ''{2}'' is not supported in arguments blocks.\nSee {3} for details.
{0}{1} Validators must be function names or function calls.
{0}{1} Validation function call must either have no parentheses or at least one reference to the argument being validated.
{0}{1} Use of function argument ''{2}'' in validation function name is not supported.
{0}{1} Validation functions can only use previously declared positional arguments, the argument being validated, or literals.
{0}{1} Validation function must use argument ''{2}''.
{0}{1} Invalid size dimension for argument ''{2}''. Each dimension must be a nonnegative integer number or a colon (:).
{0}{1} Invalid size declaration for argument ''{2}''. Arguments must have two or more dimensions.
{0}{1} Specifying validation or default value for an ignored argument is not supported.
{0}{1} All arguments blocks after an Output block must have the Output attribute. Declare all Input argument blocks before all Output blocks.
{0}{1} Attributes Input and Output may not be assigned a value or negated.
{0}{1} Attributes Input and Output may not be used together in the same arguments block. Specify inputs in one or more Inputs blocks, then specify outputs in one or more Outputs blocks.
{0}{1} Specifying a default value for outputs is not supported.
{0}{1} Name-value arguments are not supported in outputs.
{0}{1} Ignored arguments are not supported in outputs.
{0}{1} Output argument ''{2}'' is declared more than once.
{0}{1} Output validation functions must only use the argument being validated or literals.
{0}{1} Declaring multiple repeating output arguments is not supported.
{0}{1} Output argument varargout must only be used inside a Repeating arguments block.
{0}{1} Output arguments blocks and function line must contain the same output arguments in the same order.
{0}{1} Use of output arguments other than the argument ''{2}'' being validated in validation functions is not supported.

entry.note: 0 is preamble, e.g. Function argument definition error in fun.

message.entry: {0} Repeating output argument must be a cell array, but has type ''{1}''.
